title: Imam said we must say SubhanAllah Alhamdulillah AllahuAkbar together after salah & not Individually
transcript: shik I heard from an Imam that it's supposed to be said Subhan Allah alhamdulillah after every prayer and not each of them separately as Subhan Allah 33 times and then alhamdulillah 33 times and so on is it authentic to be no it is not authentic this this person who said this doesn't know what he's talking about you can do either way you can say Subhan Allah Subhan Allah Subhan Allah 33 times and you can say Subhan Allah alhamdulillah Allah abbar 33 times and this is all valid
